cards.title: Hoplite
powers: Select a target. Reduce damage dealt to and by that target by 2 untl the end of your next turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One player  may play a card.
Select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt by that target by 2.

openingLines.default: If you guys stand behind me, I can take the brunt of this!
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.LegionCharacter: You know, I don't think that quote was originally about nanomachines.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: I'm coming back with my shield or on it for this one.

cards.title: Hardlight Hoplon
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to {Hoplite} by 1. Whenever damage would be dealt to {Hoplite}, but is reduced or prevented such that he takes no damage, {Hoplite} may deal 1 target 2 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: It would be so much easier to protect{br}all of you if you also had shields!

cards.title: Luminous Lance
powers: {Hoplite} deals 1 target 3 energy damage. That target deals {Hoplite} 1 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: Fine. It's techncally not a lance. But it{br}sounds better this way.

cards.title: Rocket Boots
cards.body: Whenever {Hoplite} deals himself damage, draw a card.
powers: Reduce the next 3 instances of damage dealt to {Hoplite} by 1.
cards.flavorText: The only way to travel is atop the flaming{br}exhaust of unstable experimental gadgets.

cards.title: Reinforced Weave
cards.body: Reduce melee and projectile damage dealt to {Hoplite} by 1. When {Hoplite} would take 4 or more damage from a single source, prevent that damage and destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Primitive armor and close quarters weapons? Is this a joke?
Like all good jokes, my armor has{br}layers.

cards.title: Shield Bubble
cards.body: Play this card next to a target. When that target would deal or be dealt damage, prevent it and destroy this card. If that target leaves play, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Can you just stay there for a moment?{br}Perfect.

cards.title: Explosive Bolts
powers: {Hoplite} deals up to 5 targets 2 fire damage each, then deals himself fire damage equal to the number of targets dealt damage this way minus 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Normally, you don't bring heavy weaponry along.
Normally, my sister isn't in danger.

cards.title: Breaching Charge
cards.body: Destroy a non-target environment card. If no card is destroyed this way, {Hoplite} deals himself and each non-hero target 2 fire damage.

cards.title: Daring Rescue
cards.body: Select a hero character card other than {Hoplite}. Reduce the next damage dealt to that hero by 2. Reduce the next damage dealt to {Hoplite} by 1. {Hoplite} may deal 1 target 3 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: Hang on sis, I've got you!

cards.title: Shield Wall
cards.body: The villain target with the highest HP deals {Hoplite} 2 melee damage. Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to all hero targets other than {Hoplite} by 2.
cards.flavorText: You spend so much time shielding others,{br}you forget to shield yourself.

cards.title: Burnout
cards.body: {Hoplite} deals 1 target 3 fire damage, then 1 target 2 fire damage, then 1 target 1 fire damage. Then {Hoplite} deals himself 2 fire damage.
cards.flavorText: We're in a theater, should I shout 'FIRE!?'

cards.title: Encase
cards.body: {Hoplite} deals 1 target 4 energy damage. Search your deck or trash for a copy of Shield Bubble and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: How pathetic. The great inventor is{br}reduced to blowing bubbles at me.

cards.title: Arm Up
cards.body: Search your deck for an equipment card and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. You may use a power.
cards.flavorText: I'm no boy scout, but I'm always prepared.

cards.title: Impenatrable Refuge
cards.body: All targets are immune to damage. All cards other than this one are indestructible. At the start of your turn, remove this card from the game.
cards.flavorText: Phew, we've got a breather. Everyone get{br}ready, this large a shield won't last long.

cards.title: Hardlight Gear
cards.body: One player may play a card. {Hoplite} deals 1 target 2 energy damage.
cards.flavorText: Lucky for us, I brought boarding{br}party favors.

promoCards.title: Hoplite
powers: Select a hero target. Redirect the next 2 instances of damage dealt to that target to {Hoplite}.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
Select two hero targets. Redirect the next damage dealt to the first target to the second.

openingLines.default: Shields up, red alert! ... I just wanted an excuse to say that.
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.LegionCharacter: We've done this song and dance plenty of times. Want me to remind you how it goes?
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Even a titan like you can be felled!
